Arrangement.text:
Intro: [A | Asus]
VERSE 1: [A]Celebrate this happy morning [Asus]Darkness breaks to glorious day [A]Day of wonder, day of gladness [Asus]Look! The stone is [D]rolled [E]away [A]Hear the angel now proclaiming [Asus]He's not here, but do not dread [A]Come and see the tomb is empty [Asus]Christ is risen [D]from [A]the [E]dead
CHORUS: He's a[A]live, He's alive, He's alive Tell the [F#m7]world Jesus is alive He's the [D]King of Kings, and Lord of [E]Lords He's a[A]live, He's alive, He's alive He has [F#m7]risen with power on High And with grace [D]He reigns forever [E]more
{new_page} VERSE 2: [A]Death is swallowed up in victory [Asus]Where O' death, where is your sting [A]Over Satan and sin's power [Asus]Christ has won the [D]victo[E]ry [A]When the Snake sought to destroy Him [Asus]Jesus crushed the Serpent's head [A]Hallelujah, it is finished [Asus]Christ has risen [D]as [A]He [E]said
CHORUS: He's a[A]live, He's alive, He's alive Tell the [F#m7]world Jesus is alive He's the [D]King of Kings, and Lord of [E]Lords He's a[A]live, He's alive, He's alive He has [F#m7]risen with power on High And with grace [D]He reigns forever [E]more
Bridge: You conquered the [D]grave, salvation is [A]won The power of [E]death is over[F#m7]come [E] You raised me to [D]life, my chains are un[A]done Now I am [E]free to come to Your [F#m7]throne [E] [(2nd Time)] Now I am [F#m7]free to [E]come to Your [D]throne
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 celebrate this happy morning darkness breaks to glorious day day of wonder day of gladness look the stone is rolled away hear the angel now proclaiming hes not here but do not dread come and see the tomb is empty christ is risen from the dead chorus hes alive hes alive hes alive tell the world jesus is alive hes the king of kings and lord of lords hes alive hes alive hes alive he has risen with power on high and with grace he reigns forever more verse 2 death is swallowed up in victory where o death where is your sting over satan and sins power christ has won the victory when the snake sought to destroy him jesus crushed the serpents head hallelujah it is finished christ has risen as he said chorus hes alive hes alive hes alive tell the world jesus is alive hes the king of kings and lord of lords hes alive hes alive hes alive he has risen with power on high and with grace he reigns forever more bridge you conquered the grave salvation is won the power of death is overcome you raised me to life my chains are undone now i am free to come to your throne now i am free to come to your throne
